meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Mags Doss Tara Anderson Andy King Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7125.

div.div:
Last game of Season 31.
Alex Trebek's audio was re-recorded when his voice recovered.

td.p: Mags Doss, a physician from Atlanta, Georgia
Tara Anderson, a public radio reporter from Louisville, Kentucky
Andy King, a high school principal originally from Chatham Center, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $20,200)

tr.td: A PICTURE IS WORTH...
4-LETTER VERBS
GIVE ME A RING
THE FILMS OF STANLEY TUCCI
2nd PERSON, ACTIVE
THE OLD SOD

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Andy: What is the Columbia River?)

Puget Sound

AndyMags
')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
